summary.description:
Colobobo is a multiplayer game on mobile. Mobiles, placed side by side, create the common game interface.

In this game, you play as a slightly oblivious colony monitor who takes children on an exploration.

Collaborate, communicate and above all be reactive to go as far as possible in the expedition!
